extendedInfo.description: King of German ArticleFree German Gender and German Noun Trainer. The best way to learn German gender!Learn German Articles DER DIE DAS easily with a German gender quiz trainer and improve your knowledge of the most common German nouns. Become the King of German Article!The App includes: - All words were reviewed by Native Germans - English translation for each word so it can be used for learning German vocabulary as well - Option to add your own German nouns (limited amount for the Free Version) - Daily statistics to see your right and wrong answers for the German Articles - Useful hints for learning German Articles DER DIE DAS - Extra wordlist to see and train favorite and wrong nouns  - Several Categories and German Training Levels to choose (limited amount for the Free Version) - Choose your training case DATIV, AKKUSATIV, NOMINATIV and train the right German gender for each case - Option to just train the wrong guessed German nounsThe free version has a limited number of vocabulary. Access the full database of 3.000 German words by buying the Pro-Version. The Pro-Version also includes the function to add an unlimited number of own new words and access to all training levels and categories.Use this "King of German Article" App to learn German nouns with the right German Articles on the go. You can easily learn the right German gender while commuting or taking a short break at work. You will see soon: Deutsch lernen macht Spass! Deutsche Artikel lernen ist ganz einfach!When you add your personal vocabulary, we will collect the vocabulary and share it in one of the next upgrades. Of course the nouns and the gender der die das will be reviewed before sharing it.If you like our German vocabulary trainer, please recommand it to your friends. We also love to get feedback how you like it.King of German Article is a special trainer for learning the German gender DER DIE DASLernen Sie Deutsch mit dem Artikel-Trainer "King of German Article"! Mit dieser App koennen Sie die richtigen deutschen Artikel (der, die oder das) ganz nebenbei lernen, zum Beispiel im Zug oder waehrend einer Kaffeepause. Die Woerter und Artikel in diesem Trainer wurden von deutschen Muttersprachlern geprueft. Diese App hat viele Optionen und wird Ihnen das Lernen der deutschen Artikel erleichtern.

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Many thanks for such an amazing intuitive language app for German.   I loved it so much that I thought of rating it just after 5 min of use. I rarely do that... But this app worths it.
reviews.author: Sandeep Raj

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I have been trying many apps to help learn German grammar. This one is very simple but it does exactly what it says on the tin. I have used it for about 2 hours and successfully learned all the words in the free version. I am about to buy the Pro version - I have an exam in 5 weeks!
reviews.author: Shena Deuchars

reviews.title: Outstanding system to learn from your errors!
reviews.comment: Ideal to learn some words in the train or when you have a few minutes.
reviews.author: Sergio Ortega

reviews.comment: Helps with articles where translators don\'t
reviews.author: Gina Moreno

reviews.title: very useful
reviews.comment: but would be even perfect if there were sample sentences...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super ...
reviews.comment: Das ist super aber sie k\303\266nnen mehr arbeiten ;) darum 4 Star. Du bist richtig und ich hoffe geht so :) 5*
reviews.author: Alex Ahesteh

reviews.title: Great App for learning German Gramma
reviews.comment: This App is a great way to get more familiar with the german gramma. I can recommend this to anyone trying to learn the german language and especially learning the german articles.
reviews.author: Dirk Wendling

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: It\'s the best german gender trainer. I was searching and waiting for this app for long time
reviews.author: JinWoo Wang

reviews.title: Wirklich toll
reviews.comment: Sie k\303\266nnen die Artikeln lernen und die Bedeutung im W\303\266rterbuch sehen.  Sehr gut.  Vielen Dank.
reviews.author: mohammad mehyar
